评论详情: Makes you look Royal.!!, and excellent material, it also fit well.!!
He loves the way it feels and how light it is
I got this for my husband, it is very nice and it fits him well. He likes the style and the quality! The color is rich! I am waiting to see if he wants more colors. Highly recommend!

This is something you either love or hate. If you are looking at ordering it, you probably already like the style and are halfway there. It isn't the truly beautiful hand embroidered design of a traditional outfit like this - but the design is still done well and doesn't look like it will peel or have any issues.  The pants have an elastic waist which doesn't look great BUT you also do not see the waist with the top on so it doesn't matter at all what it looks like and it does make for a comfortable wearing experience. No worrying about it being tight on the waist or any issues with wearing them for a full day.  Casual enough to wear for something less than formal but dressy enough to get away with wearing it for a special occasion too.
This mens suit was purchased as a gift for a friend.  The recipient loved it.  It washed and ironed well.  I would purchase again.

The design is like a block print and its not embroidery. Material is soft but unbreathable and makes it uncomfortable to wera and sleeves are way too long , and if you cut the sleeves, the design is lost. The front is open, so you have to wear something under it, otherwise skin will show. Too expensive for the quality offered.
Looking at the picture it seems like this would be a silk kind of material it's more like sweatpants. The pants have elastic and don't match the aesthetic of the top.

评论概述: Cool Fashion Statement for Hot Time/Summer in the City
评论详情: LOVE the fact that is lightweight cotton's made for super hot climates. I'd originally imagined the man in my life might see this as knock-around-the-house loungewear/pajamas...but perhaps that's more my style. Surprisingly, the man in my life reserves this for special occasions and knocks it out of the park.

I was excited to get this Dashiki, but was disappointed upon its arrival. The material is very awkward feeling and is almost rigid. The pattern is nice, but it looks as if it’s stamped onto the material. The material is also very thin. I purchased a XL and the cut and fit are ok, and I’m over 6’ 2”. That’s about the only good thing. For $53.99, I was expecting something of much higher quality, especially with the word “Luxury” in the name. This item is about the same quality of a value store pajama set. Save your money and do not purchase.

Shipping was ok and on time. Clothing arrived undamaged. This suit is a traditional African suit worn in West Africa. If visiting Ghana you will blend in well but your accent will definitely give pause and give where you are from away. All Joking aside the item is true to color. The item fits as described. For washing I would recommend dark color detergent, gentle cycle. Overall the item is comfortable, good for formal occasions or travel to places such as West Africa or Middle East, and is reasonably priced.
The material is too light and transparent. The trouser is also too big for its size
Great outfit

This outfit is gorgeous in person. My husband was very comfortable all evening. I was concerned the fabric would be thin and gold details would look cheap, but they did not!  Not a cheap looking design. Very sleek and comfortable.
Very comfortable my husband love it. Material is very sift.

This is CHEAP, THIN, NOT EMBROIDERED, CHEAP gold print!!! Mt husband refuses to wear this cheap mess. SMH -VERY poor quality -VERY over priced -VERY disappointed I will definitely be returning this! Wish I could give a negative -1 star-

This outfit surprised me. I wasn’t expecting the quality of the material to be as good as it is. It’s thin, but not “cheap feeling” thin. My husband likes the feel of it and the comfort of it. In addition, the gold design detail not only adds a nice aesthetic, but it’s vibrant and consistent. The acrylic the design is made from adheres nicely to the material and isn’t showing any signs that it will begin to peel over time. The shirt fits perfectly, however the only draw back we have is the pants come up just a little short. My husband is 6’4”, about 219 lbs and the pants barely fall below his ankle. More noticeable when he sits. If he sized up the outfit would be way too baggy. Otherwise, this outfit would have been rated a 5/5 easy.

This attire is crafted with quality fabric. The shining golden trims have retained their luster even after several washes. The size and fit of this outfit perfectly match the description, providing me comfort while looking stylish.  Overall five stars.
Very nice quality outfit nice appearance love the color Very comfy

I'm buying every color. Plain and simple!  Love, love, love this! Light, and cool. Not thick. Great quality. Kind of like a dress shirt material, but that also means it's kinda a punk to iron or stream iron. Definitely comes out of the laundry wrinkled. Bright color and style. Perfect XL fitting by American standard.  Definitely getting more colors! 💯

It looks great. Just hoping fit is true to size

评论概述: Semi formal, comfortable, breathable, wrinkles easily
评论详情: Hello friends, I selected this daupanzee men's suit and purple for Easter.My housemate wanted a fancy looking outfit for Easter but didn't want to sweat to death.  I got him the purple version of this suit.  It is 100% cotton and is true to size.  The pants were very baggy and extra long.  I was able to iron it but it gave me some grief getting it perfect.  The purple is true to the picture. The buttons are actually white with gold accenting.  I thought I would need to replace them but they looked fine.  The suit looks really good on someone who has muscles.  My housemate wore this outfit with a pair of round sunglasses. He looked good.  He looked like he was a globetrotter.  Everyone had varying opinions on whether or not the suit was African or Indian.  The suit is very thin and wrinkles very easily.  He said he felt comfortable the entire day. He was very happy with his look.

评论概述: Nice and Comfortable - Not the absolute best quality.
评论详情: Don't judge until you try it on.  The fabric initially feels like it's hotel bed sheets. The gold printed design looks more towards orange, and is clearly printed onto the fabric as the texture shows. First impressions not so good, however...  Once I wore it, however, I really liked it. Very comfortable and felt good quality and looks sharp.  So yeah, I'd recommend not to make final judgement until you try it on.
My brother LOVES this outfit! He wears it all the time. It’s true to size and great quality! You won’t be disappointed!

The material is very comfortable on the skin. It is also lighter than expected, which is a big plus! I live in Florida, and I dislike heavy clothing. The pattern design (in gold) is lovely and stands out when light hits it. Given that the color I chose, it’s dark-Ish, the gold patterns still make it stand out!

Feels like a thin cotton bed sheet material with a tad of starchiness. Could be used as a pajama.  Fits like a Large should, I’m about 6ft 210lbs. Pants could easily fit somebody larger.  Neck barely fits me but it fits and I size as a 16.5” neck size.  I wish it was a little softer on the skin and maybe a tad thicker fabric.

These suits are just the best, low maintenance, they look good, they are versatile and fit so many occasions. I really like this color it is just in time for Easter. The material is soft and breathable. The design makes it look elegant and regal. The suit is so comfortable to wear and it fits perfectly. The sizing chart is pretty accurate. I love them.

This item came quickly, right on time. I particularly like the colors I chose which are dark blue with the silver design. I went to church even though I'm a Roman Catholic and mostly White. It goes well with my silver crucifix. I'm an ordained minister in universal Life Church, and I attend other Christian churches to make donations and fundraising programs. I love the dishica because although it is very reverent it is not necessarily promoting myself as clergy when I'm in other people's churches.

评论概述: It suits everyone perfectly and flatters all body types.
评论详情: I ordered the luxurious Daupanzees Men's African 2 Piece Suit. This exquisite ensemble seamlessly blends traditional African aesthetics with modern comfort. The finely crafted dashiki top features an eye-catching stamp print that complements the tailored trousers.  The fabric caresses your skin. The breathable and wrinkle-resistant material allows for effortless wear and a crisp appearance all day long. It suits everyone perfectly and flatters all body types. The button-down design adds a touch of sophistication, ensuring a perfect fit.  Whether it's a special celebration, a formal business meeting, or a casual get-together, the Daupanzees African 2 Piece Suit fits the bill perfectly. The relaxed fit allows for freedom of movement, while the soft fabric envelops you in a cozy embrace. Slip into this ensemble and feel instantly empowered and自信.

Material feels very weird, stiff and fake like. My husband hates it over his skin. It also bleed the color ton upon washing. We got the navy blue. Cut is nice especially when a man has a fit body, so it does look good. Slightly tempered shirt. But pants are way too short :/ My husband is 6'2 and it hits above his ankles. Unfortunately I don't see him wearing this... pass.

At first, I felt like the material was stiff and cheap but as I wore the outfit it started to loosen up; give it some time and a wash, it will forgive. The fit was nice, although a fit guideline would be very helpful Amazon's "auto-matching" mostly worked. I really like the buttons as they are white with gold trim. As others have noted the pant legs are a bit on the long side, but I think it's better for them to be long and need hemming than short and look silly.  Overall, my wife really enjoys this suit and that's good enough for me. Yours likely will enjoy it as well.

评论概述: Looks nice, but quality is only fair, and sizing is weird.
评论详情: Thin cotton cloth that feels a bit stiff and hard on the skin. This improves a bit with washing. Only good for warm weather, as it is extremely lightweight cloth. I play in a band, and this will be joining my stage clothes collection. Pattern is nice, especially on black cloth. Sizing is nutty, and makes no sense. I have a 41" chest and 34" waist, and normally take size Large for T-shirts and button shirts, but chart says "Small," and then pants would be far too small. I ordered by my waist size, and ignored the shirt sizing. I ended up with an XL, and the top and bottom fit properly. ORDER BY YOUR WAIST SIZE, AND IGNORE THE SIZING FOR TOP. Given the thin, inexpensive material, this outfit is very overpriced. Shop around.

I gifted this beautiful set of luxury clothing to my friend and he is so happy to wear it.It is embroidered with a simple design and the fabric is so soft.It looks so elegant on him and can be worn inside or outside the house for a special occasion or in a normal day.A great gift to a good friend.

I’ve been looking for formal African wear for my husband. Everything is too thin or too tight. This fits so well. The pants are loose and the shirt fits great! My daughter called her dad a handsome prince! Very nice!
It is made of good material, but I did not expect it to be printed and not embroidered

I honestly didn't buy this for a man. I got it for me. My plan was to use the dashiki as a jacket and wear a tee or tank with the pants. For this reason I got it in yellow.  The Material The cotton is stiff and ungiving. Let's just call it hard. It's hard cotton. I wouldn't even let my cat sleep on something this hard. It reminds me of the cotton (broadcloth) my mom made her ironing board covers out of. It's not something I'd want next to my skin. I thought maybe if I wore it a bit or put it in the washer that it would soften and loosen up, but I can't get the dang thing on!  Fit I have broad shoulders but not broader than your average man at least I don't think they are. I felt like Herman Munster. I couldn't get both arms in. I measured it against the woman's top I had taken off. Different widths, but not that different. The way it's sewn there's not enough should room and the arms are small. Yes, I know men's and women's sizes are different. It's not my first time at the rodeo, but I've never been this far off before. It's not cut well at all. I bought a 3x but I don't think a 4x would fit. There's no size on the bag or in the garment that I could find. It's highly possible this is the incorrect size. Doesn't make a difference though. The size won't fix the material quality.  My brother used to wear sets like this one all the time when I was little. I thought they were pretty and he always looked so comfortable. The cotton was soft, too. I thought one day I'm going to get one of those. Apparently, it's not today. This was a dream deferred.

I have a couple of these from different makers and like them way better. The material is really cheap and it doesn't feel very pleasant wearing it. The color and patterns are ok but don't help to make it look special by any means. I am not impressed since there isn't anything outstanding for this one. Personally, I'd look around for other ones.

评论概述: pattern looks nice. Red is a darker shade than picture, but close. A little wide on the pants legs
评论详情: Overall the suit looks as expected. The material is solid, but a little stiff. Definitely want to iron it. The pattern looks nice and the buttons are well made and look nice. The design was a little wide in the width of the pants legs. The elastic band had them stay on just fine, but the pants have a straight, not tapered, design so expect a wide bottom.

评论概述: Well made, great looking, all cotton!
评论详情: This is a very good looking formal Dashiki outfit.  The top is very well made.  It is a button-up and not a pull-over, so it is not only easy to put on, but you can adjust the buttons for the temperatures. I do wish the buttons were black to match instead of white, but minor quibble that can be fixed.  The XL top fits my muscle building chest easily and well. Gives a great look.  The pants have a drawstring and are on the looser side, with a bit of extra length.  Still immediately usable on my 31 inch leg size. Also can be hemmed.  The two front pockets on the pants are deep for phones.  The top goes over the pants down to the proper length, covering most of the waist and hip areas.  HAND WASH ONLY. Don't ruin a good thing!  This is going to be my outfit for all formal occasions.
